summary: A simple edit of all the Ancient Nord weapons textures to make them look more \"ancient\".
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Demidekidasu][IMG]http://www.massey.ac.nz/massey/fms/Massey%20News/site-images/icons/social-media/youtube-icon.png[/IMG][/url][url=https://twitter.com/Demidekidasu][IMG]http://www.kellilampkin.com/wp-content/plugins/wp-greet-box/images/twitter_icon.png[/IMG][/url][/center]
=======================
DDD-ANCIENT NORD WEAPONS
=======================
version 1.0
30/06/2012
By Demidekidasu
============

==||-DESCRIPTION-||==
A simple edit of all the Ancient Nord weapons textures to make them look more \"ancient\". Instead of them being blue with strange red paint smeared all over, they are now more worn-looking and covered with rust and grime.

==||-INSTALLATION-||==
Extract the provided \"textures\" folder to your Skyrim \"Data\" folder. Answer with \"Yes\" or \"OK\" if asked to overwrite/merge.

To uninstall, delete the following files found in [Skyrim/Data/textures/weapons/draugr]:

draugrarrow.dds
draugrarrow_m.dds
draugrbattleaxe.dds
draugrbattleaxe_m.dds
draugrbow.dds
draugrbow_m.dds
draugrgreatssword.dds
draugrgreatssword_m.dds
draugrhandaxe.dds
draugrhandaxe_m.dds
draugrsword.dds
draugrsword_m.dds

==||-DISCLAIMER-||==
This mod did not break your computer and it did not run over your cat. Don\'t try to say it did.

I have much better things to do with my time than provide support for those who don\'t know how to install mods and end up making a mess. There are litterally hundreds of places on the internet where you can find this simple info. Your own ignorance/incompetence is not my fault.

==||-PERMISSIONS-||==
Do whatever you want with these textures, as long as you don\'t break Bethesda\'s copyrights. I didn\'t make the textures, I merely edited them.

==||-CREDITS-||==
Big thanks to Bethesda Softworks for making this fantastic game!
author: Demidekidasu
